scenario_text.value:
Wait, does that mean you aren’t gonna look
with us, Professor?
Yes, I’m afraid so. I’ll rest here for a bit.

I thought I was used to working in the field,
but my age is catching up with me.

Man, must be tough getting older. On the
knees, I mean.
Ho ho, couldn’t have said it better myself!

Minoru, do not make light of the companion
who has journeyed so far with us.
What? But I wasn’t!

It’s okay, Professor, we’ll look for the
shrine. You just rest here.
Leave it to us!

Thank you. I’ll contribute to your search
with all the knowledge at my disposal.
Well then, time to get back to the⁠—
Huh? Over there... Ain’t that Haru?
Haru?! Why is he here?!
Heeey, Haruuu!

Whoa! The heck is he running for?! Yo, you
think he’s another fake?

No, if he was, he’d try to come trick us like
the fake Miyuki did.

That’s definitely the real Haru. I’d
recognize that restless countenance anywhere.
Ah, true that... But why, then?

(Haru... Why’s he here by himself? He up and
vanished after I was swallowed by the fog.)

(But he’s running away... What’s he hiding
from us? Why would he leave without a word?)

(Hold up, what’s there to doubt about a kid
like that? We should head after him.)
(What should we do?)
We have to follow him!
What’s he hiding?
Why is he here?
We have to follow him!

Hey! What’s he thinking, wandering around in
a place like this?!
Hrrm, something strange is afoot...
C’mon, Falcomon! Let’s go!
Why’d he run? Is he hiding something from us?

What’s with the twenty questions, man?! We
gotta chase him or he’ll get lost again!
Indeed, let us make haste!
Why is he here?

He must have gotten lost! Never mind that
now, we gotta hurry after him!

Hmm, something’s not right, but...I’d feel
awful if we left him on his own!
Professor? Is something bothering you?

Umm... No, pay it no mind. It’s a personal
matter.
Go on, you should hurry after him.
Sure, all right...

I’ll wait here as a contingency. Please,
pursue that child without delay.
